sentences.english: The change of organic acids in rice wine with the extension of fermentation time was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了江米酒中有机酸的成分及其随发酵时间的变化。

sentences.english: People in southern China like to drink fermented glutinous rice wine.
sentences.chinese: 南方人喜欢喝由江米制成的江米酒。

sentences.english: People in southern China like to drink fermented glutinous rice wine.
sentences.chinese: 南方人喜欢喝由江米制成的江米酒。

sentences.english: In maps in Ming and Qing Dynasty, it was called "East and West Jiangmi Lane".
sentences.chinese: 在明清的地图上称为“东西江米巷”。

sentences.english: The milk-clotting mechanism of glutinous rice wine was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了江米酒制作米酒奶的凝乳机理。

sentences.english: The coat covering the soft candies is made from glutinous rice.
sentences.chinese: 包裹软糖的江米纸是由糯米做成的。

sentences.english: Dough Figurines are Chinese traditional art form and is commonly known as sticky rice flour toys.
sentences.chinese: 面塑是中国的一种民间工艺，俗称面人或者江米人。

definition: sticky rice/short-grain rice/Oryza sativa var. japonica
long-grained rice (Indian rice, as opposed to round-grained rice 粳米[jing1 mi3])
nian gao, New Year cake, typically a sweet, steamed cake made with glutinous rice flour
boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
